verses.verse: דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> The words יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> of Jeremiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חִלְקִיָּ֑הוּ <WH2518> of Hilkiah מִן־ <WH4480> at הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> of the priests אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בַּעֲנָת֔וֹת <WH6068> that [were] in Anathoth בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> of Benjamin

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to whom הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> To whom the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> in בִּימֵ֛י <WH3117> came in the days יֹאשִׁיָּ֥הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמ֖וֹן <WH526> of Amon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah בִּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> three עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year לְמָלְכֽוֹ׃ <WH4427> of his reign

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בִּימֵ֨י <WH3117> It came also in the days יְהוֹיָקִ֤ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah עַד־ <WH5704> until תֹּם֙ <WH8552> unto the end עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH6249> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year לְצִדְקִיָּ֥הוּ <WH6667> of Zedekiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah עַד־ <WH5704> until גְּל֥וֹת <WH1540> captive יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <WH2549> in the fifth ס
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בְּטֶ֨רֶם <WH2962> Before [אֶצֹּורְךָ כ] (אֶצָּרְךָ֤ <WH3335> earthen ק) בַבֶּ֙טֶן֙ <WH990> thee in the belly יְדַעְתִּ֔יךָ <WH3045> I knew וּבְטֶ֛רֶם <WH2962> and before תֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> thee and before thou camest forth מֵרֶ֖חֶם <WH7358> out of the womb הִקְדַּשְׁתִּ֑יךָ <WH6942> I sanctified נָבִ֥יא <WH5030> thee a prophet לַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> unto the nations נְתַתִּֽיךָ׃ <WH5414> thee [and] I ordained

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> Then said אֲהָהּ֙ <WH162> I Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Lord יְהֹוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> behold I cannot דַּבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> speak כִּי־ <WH3588> Because נַ֖עַר <WH5288> for I [am] a child אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> I פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> But the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תֹּאמַ֖ר <WH559> unto me Say נַ֣עַר <WH5288> not I [am] a child אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> I כִּ֠י <WH3588> for עַֽל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> I אֶֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֙ <WH7971> to all that I shall send תֵּלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> shall go וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i אֲצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> thee and whatsoever I command תְּדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> thee thou shalt speak

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> Be not afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> of their faces כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִתְּךָ֥ <WH854> for אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I am לְהַצִּלֶ֖ךָ <WH5337> for I [am] with thee to deliver נְאֻם־ <WH5002> thee saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> put forth יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Then the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> his hand וַיַּגַּ֖ע <WH5060> and touched עַל־ <WH5921> and פִּ֑י <WH6310> my mouth וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> unto me Behold I have put דְבָרַ֖י <WH1697> my words בְּפִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> in thy mouth

רְאֵ֞ה <WH7200> See הִפְקַדְתִּ֣יךָ ׀ <WH6485> set הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> I have this day הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this עַל־ <WH5921> over הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> thee over the nations וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over הַמַּמְלָכ֔וֹת <WH4467> and over the kingdoms לִנְת֥וֹשׁ <WH5428> to root out וְלִנְת֖וֹץ <WH5422> and to pull down וּלְהַאֲבִ֣יד <WH6> and to destroy וְלַהֲר֑וֹס <WH2040> and to throw down לִבְנ֖וֹת <WH1129> to build וְלִנְטֽוֹעַ׃ <WH5193> and to plant פ

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֣י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> came unto me saying מָה־ <WH4100> What אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you רֹאֶ֖ה <WH7200> what seest יִרְמְיָ֑הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> thou? And I said מַקֵּ֥ל <WH4731> a rod שָׁקֵ֖ד <WH8247> of an almond tree אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I רֹאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> I see

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about הֵיטַ֣בְתָּ <WH3190> unto me Thou hast well לִרְא֑וֹת <WH7200> seen כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שֹׁקֵ֥ד <WH8245> for I will hasten אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I עַל־ <WH5921> over דְּבָרִ֖י <WH1697> my word לַעֲשֹׂתֽוֹ׃ <WH6213> to perform פ

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me שֵׁנִ֣ית <WH8145> came unto me the second time לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> I רֹאֶ֑ה <WH7200> What seest וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> thou? And I said סִ֤יר <WH5518> pot נָפ֙וּחַ֙ <WH5301> a seething אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I רֹאֶ֔ה <WH7200> I see וּפָנָ֖יו <WH6440> and the face מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> thereof [is] toward צָפֽוֹנָה׃ <WH6828> the north

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Then the LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me מִצָּפוֹן֙ <WH6828> unto me Out of the north תִּפָּתַ֣ח <WH6605> shall break forth הָרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> an evil עַ֥ל <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> upon all the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold קֹרֵ֗א <WH7121> For lo I will call לְכָֽל־ <WH3605> all מִשְׁפְּח֛וֹת <WH4940> all the families מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <WH4467> of the kingdoms צָפ֖וֹנָה <WH6828> of the north נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וּבָ֡אוּ <WH935> and they shall come וְֽנָתְנוּ֩ <WH5414> and they shall set אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> every one כִּסְא֜וֹ <WH3678> his throne פֶּ֣תַח ׀ <WH6607> at the entering שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> of the gates יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְעַ֤ל <WH5921> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all חוֹמֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH2346> and against all the walls סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> thereof round about וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> and against all the cities יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וְדִבַּרְתִּ֤י <WH1696> And I will utter מִשְׁפָּטַי֙ <WH4941> my judgments אוֹתָ֔ם <WH854> for עַ֖ל <WH5921> against them touching כָּל־ <WH3605> all רָעָתָ֑ם <WH7451> all their wickedness אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whereby עֲזָב֗וּנִי <WH5800> who have forsaken וַֽיְקַטְּרוּ֙ <WH6999> me and have burned incense לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> unto other וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <WH7812> and worshipped לְמַעֲשֵׂ֥י <WH4639> the works יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3027> of their own hands

וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you תֶּאְזֹ֣ר <WH247> Thou therefore gird up מָתְנֶ֔יךָ <WH4975> thy loins וְקַמְתָּ֙ <WH6965> and arise וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <WH1696> and speak אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I אֲצַוֶּ֑ךָּ <WH6680> unto them all that I command אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּחַת֙ <WH2865> thee be not dismayed מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> at their faces פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> or אֲחִתְּךָ֖ <WH2865> lest I confound לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> thee before

וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> For behold I הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> now behold נְתַתִּ֣יךָ <WH5414> have made הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> thee this day לְעִ֨יר <WH5892> city מִבְצָ֜ר <WH4013> a defenced וּלְעַמּ֥וּד <WH5982> pillar בַּרְזֶ֛ל <WH1270> and an iron וּלְחֹמ֥וֹת <WH2346> walls נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> and brasen עַל־ <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> against the whole land לְמַלְכֵ֤י <WH4428> against the kings יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah לְשָׂרֶ֔יהָ <WH8269> against the princes לְכֹהֲנֶ֖יהָ <WH3548> thereof against the priests וּלְעַ֥ם <WH5971> thereof and against the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וְנִלְחֲמ֥וּ <WH3898> And they shall fight אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> against וְלֹא־ <WH3808> they will not י֣וּכְלוּ <WH3201> against thee but they shall not prevail לָ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִתְּךָ֥ <WH854> for אֲנִ֛י <WH589> you נְאֻם־ <WH5002> against thee for I [am] with thee saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לְהַצִּילֶֽךָ׃ <WH5337> to deliver פ
